name: Without Escape
synopsis: Without Escape harkens back to first-person graphic adventures of the early ‘90s, which relied on pre-rendered backgrounds and full-motion video to tell interactive stories. Explore the confines of your own home as you flip between a mundane existence and a horrifying otherworld. Can you escape the nightmare and find the answers you’re looking for? Features: - Reconnect with the past through classic point-and-click exploration. - Overcome enigmatic puzzles that will test your wits. - Immerse yourself in your home’s oppressive atmosphere with an atmospheric soundtrack. - Discover multiple endings, secrets, and Easter eggs.
